name: Tim Cain
info:
• 简体中文名: 提姆·凯恩
  • 别名: Timothy Cain
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1965-08-25
detail: Tim Cain is an American video game developer best known as the producer, lead programmer and one of the main designers of the 1997 computer game Fallout. In 2009 he was chosen by IGN as one of the top 100 game creators of all time.

works.name: Pillars of Eternity / 永恒之柱
Vampire: The Masquerade-Bloodlines / 吸血鬼：避世之血族
The Temple of Elemental Evil / 邪恶元素圣殿
Arcanum: Of Steamworks and Magick Obscura / 奥秘：蒸汽与魔法
